TextEng: Right, I will just kill him.
Who are you?
Let me see what I can do.
Text: 내가 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게.

TextEng: What is it worth for me to do this?
Text: 이걸 하면 뭘 받을 수 있는데?

TextEng: What am I supposed to do with the giant right there?
I'll be right back.
That might work, but it might not. Any other possibilities?
Text: 될 수도 있지만 안 될 수도 있어. 다른 방법은 없어?

TextEng: Actually I have some special powder <StartHighlight>[choking powder]</Start> here.  I could give you some to put into his food.
Text: 사실 여기 특별한 가루 <StartHighlight>[질식 가루]</Start>가 있어. 음식에 넣으라고 좀 줄까.

TextEng: Do it my way, or I won't help you!
Text: 내 방식대로 해, 안 그러면 도와주지 않을 거야!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> It won't hurt him, it will just help him sleep.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 다치지 않아, 그냥 잠드는 걸 도와줄 뿐이야.

TextEng: I changed my mind. Let's try it your way.
Text: 마음이 바뀌었어. 네 방식대로 해 보자.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Craft Trap]</Start> <StartAction>[Use choking powder to make a poison.]</Start>
Let's try it your way then.
I don't like that plan. I think we should try something else.
Text: 그 계획은 마음에 안 들어. 다른 걸 시도해야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: Let's give that a try.
Right. I'll be back later.
What am I supposed to do again?
Fine, I'll go kill it.
That wasn't in here a second ago.
Where did it come from though?
I'll go look, but I won't kill the rat.
Text: 가서 볼게, 근데 쥐는 안 죽일 거야.

TextEng: Why do I have to kill the rat?
Alright.
I'll get it.
Maybe we should talk first.
Your father is dead.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> Sorry, bad joke. He's fine.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> I don't know how it happened.
I had to kill him. Now, back to business.
Who said you were safe?
You are right. I will meet you at your father's farm.
Text: 네 말이 맞아. 네 아버지 농장에서 만나자.

TextEng: I think I would like to kill you now.
There is a reward a young, female like you could give me.
Text: 너처럼 젊은 여자가 줄 수 있는 보상이 있지.

TextEng: I think I could use a personal slave.
I will meet you there then.
